You’ll enjoy leisurely days on Mykonos and Santorini, a peaceful interlude on Paros, and seamless ferry transfers linking it all — all while the essentials (hotels, breakfast, transfers) are pre-arranged. It’s a beautifully balanced itinerary offering freedom, flexibility, and time to soak up Greece’s magic at your own pace. Combine this tour with the Taste of Athens for a complete Greece experience. View more View less 9 nights + ferries & breakfast from $ 1948 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until sold out Your inclusions 3 nights in Mykonos 3 nights in Paros 3 nights in Santorini Breakfast daily Ferry from Athens to Mykonos Ferry from Mykonos to Paros Ferry from Paros to Santorini Ferry from Santorini to Athens Private transfer from Athens hotel to Piraeus Port Itinerary Day 1: Athens - Mykonos Start the morning with a departure transfer to Piraeus Port for your ferry to Mykonos. Upon arrival into Mykonos, make your own way to the hotel. Overnight in Mykonos. Day 2: Mykonos Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Today you’ll enjoy the charming island of Mykonos at your own pace. You may wish to spend it wandering the town of Mykonos taking in the traditional whitewashed houses, colourful windows and narrowed pebbled streets. Overnight in Mykonos. Day 3: Mykonos After breakfast, today is spent at leisure. Perhaps you may wish to treat yourself to a day of sailing the south coast of Mykonos on an optional tour. Overnight in Mykonos. Day 4: Mykonos - Paros Make your own way to Mykonos Port for your ferry to Paros. Upon arrival make your own way to the hotel. Overnight in Paros. Day 5: Paros Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Today is at your own leisure. We recommend a visit to the picturesque fishing village of Naoussa which is located on the northern part of the island. Naoussa has to be one of the prettiest villages in the cyclades with it’s traditional charm, whitewashed houses and churches. Perhaps enjoy a cocktail at a local bar while watching the sun set. Overnight in Paros. Day 6: Paros - Santorini Make your own way to Paros Port for your ferry to Santorini. Upon arrival into Santorini, make your own way to the hotel in Santorini. Overnight in Santorini. Day 7: Santorini After breakfast, spend the day at leisure. We recommend that you visit the village of Oia, with it’s whitewashed houses, sun-kissed terraces and blue-domed churches, you’ll be sure to fall in love with this island. Overnight in Santorini. Day 8: Santorini Enjoy breakfast at the hotel while you take in the views of this stunning island. Spend today soaking up the everlasting beauty of Santorini with it’s rugged cliffs, volcanic landscape and beautiful beaches. Overnight in Santorini. Day 9: Santorini - Piraeus, Athens Make your own way to Santorini Port to catch the ferry to Athens. Late arrival into Piraeus. A relaxed itinerary enjoying different experiences on each of the Cycladic Islands.
